item.title: 欧洲央行穆勒警告关税和德国支出可能会刺激通胀
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马迪斯-穆勒警告说，美国的贸易关税和德国公共支出的增加可能会刺激通货膨胀。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Madis Muller warned that US trade tariffs and higher public spending in Germany could stoke inflation.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势加剧，中国削减美国大宗商品采购量
item.description: 随着世界上最大的两个经济体之间的贸易战愈演愈烈，中国上个月大幅减少了对美国许多商品的进口，在某些情况下甚至降至零。【原文：China sharply reduced imports of many US commodities last month, in some cases to zero, as the trade war between the world’s two biggest economies intensified.】

item.title: 日本执政党将就关税问题提出紧急提案
item.description: 据彭博社看到的文件显示，执政党自民党周一将在美国加征关税后提出一项紧急提案，敦促政府加强对企业的贷款支持并刺激内需。【原文：The ruling Liberal Democratic Party on Monday is set to make an emergency proposal in the wake of the US tariffs, urging the government to strengthen loan support for companies and boost domestic demand, according to documents seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 印度银行业因低关税而创下历史新高
item.description: 印度贷款机构的股价创下历史新高，原因是该行业相对不受关税相关动荡的影响，因此投资者继续看好该行业。【原文：A gauge of Indian lenders’ shares rose to a record, as investors remain bullish on the sector due to its relative insulation to the tariff-related turmoil.】

item.title: 台积电警告称其人工智能芯片对华出口能力有限
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. listed the challenges of ensuring export control compliance by its customers, months after the company’s artificial intelligence silicon was found to have flowed to US-sanctioned Huawei Technologies Co. via intermediaries.】

item.title: 说 "你被解雇了"，看看会发生什么
item.description:
现在解雇鲍威尔可能会引发一场史诗般的金融危机。最好等他的任期结束。【原文：

Sacking Powell now could trigger an epic financial crisis. Best to wait for his term to end.

】

item.title: 海关数据显示中国在贸易战中停止进口美国液化天然气
item.description: 由于两个最大经济体之间的贸易战改变了航运路线，中国对美国液化天然气的购买量在前两个月急剧下降后，在 3 月份骤降至零。【原文：China’s purchases of US liquefied natural gas plunged to zero in March after a sharp decline in the previous two months, as the trade war between the two biggest economies alters shipping routes.】

item.title: 信托业陷入困境，另一家中国影子银行寻求国家帮助
item.description: 中国国有中航信托公司在推迟支付部分投资产品的款项后，正在向两家同行寻求援助，这表明中国 3.7 万亿美元信托业的问题正在恶化。【原文：China’s state-owned AVIC Trust Co. is seeking assistance from two of its peers after delaying payments on some of its investment products, a sign of worsening problems in the country’s $3.7 trillion trust industry.】

item.title: 特朗普力挺鲍威尔，美元走软，比特币反弹
item.description: 比特币反弹至唐纳德-特朗普宣布 "解放日 "关税以来的最高水平，因为人们再次担心美国总统会罢免美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell），导致美元汇率下滑。【原文：Bitcoin rallied to its highest level since Donald Trump’s “Liberation Day” tariff announcements as the dollar slumped amid renewed fears over the US president’s efforts to remove Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 世界经济首脑将在华盛顿面对特朗普的贸易战
item.description: 世界经济和金融首脑们希望为百年来最严重的全球贸易危机找到一条出路。本周，他们将前往危机的中心。【原文：World economic and finance chiefs want an off-ramp from the worst global trade crisis in a century. This week they’re heading toward its epicenter.】

item.title: 价格飙升，日本二十年来首次购买韩国大米
item.description: 日本大米价格飙升，为韩国生产商出口主食打开了一扇难得的机会之窗。【原文：Japan’s surging rice prices have opened a rare window of opportunity for South Korean producers to export the staple food.】

item.title: 大亨称特朗普关税可能损害菲律宾的贸易伙伴
item.description: 菲律宾亿万富翁海梅-奥古斯托-佐贝尔-德-阿亚拉（Jaime Augusto Zobel de Ayala）说，相对于本地区其他国家，东南亚国家可能从美国降低关税中获得的任何好处，都可能因美国对其一些贸易伙伴征税的影响而受到限制。【原文：Philippine billionaire Jaime Augusto Zobel de Ayala said any benefit that the Southeast Asian nation may have from the lower US tariffs relative to its regional peers may be limited by the impact of the levies on some of its trade partners.】

item.title: 京东将在中国增加 10 万名外卖骑手，与美团一较高下
item.description: JD.com Inc.计划在未来三个月内增加10万名全职骑手，在与市场领导者美团的竞争白热化之际，扩大其食品外卖业务。【原文：JD.com Inc. plans to add 100,000 full-time riders within the next three months, amplifying its food delivery push as competition against market leader Meituan heats up.】

item.title: 日本超长期债券因避险需求吸引创纪录外资流入
item.description: 上个月，日本超长期政府债券吸引了创纪录的外资流入，原因是美国关税政策导致避险情绪升温，增强了这种证券作为避风港的吸引力。【原文：Japanese super-long government bonds drew a record foreign inflow last month as heightened risk aversion amid US tariff policy burnished the securities’ allure as a haven.】

item.title: 印度银行业在财报密集周前仍是避风港
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 美国对乙烷征收关税，中国塑料厂面临关闭风险
item.description: 由于世界上最大的两个经济体正在为一场旷日持久的贸易战做准备，依赖主要从美国进口的天然气的中国塑料工厂正面临着停产的前景。【原文：Chinese plastics factories that depend on a gas they mainly import from the US are contending with the prospect of shutdowns as the world’s two largest economies bunker down for a prolonged trade war.】

item.title: 中国警告各国不要以牺牲中国利益为代价削减美国贸易协议
item.description: 中国警告各国不要与美国达成可能损害北京利益的交易，从而加大了与华盛顿贸易战的力度，并显示了其他国家如何冒着被夹在中间的风险。【原文：China warned countries against striking deals with the US that could hurt Beijing’s interests, upping the ante in the trade war with Washington and showing how others risk getting caught in the middle.】

item.title: 投机交易员因关税将日元看涨押注推升至创纪录水平
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战推动了美国资产的抛售，并刺激了避险需求，投机交易员对日元的看涨程度创下历史之最。【原文：Speculative traders became most bullish on the yen on record as President Donald Trump’s trade war drives selling of US assets and boosts haven demand.】

item.title: 马航寻求波音飞机，因为中国停止交付：马来西亚
item.description: 据《伯纳马报》周日报道，马来西亚航空集团有限公司（Malaysia Aviation Group Bhd.【原文：Malaysia Aviation Group Bhd. is in talks with Boeing Co. to potentially take over delivery slots vacated by Chinese carriers as the US-China trade war heats up, Bernama reported Sunday.】

item.title: 韩国总统候选人誓言提振股市
item.description: 韩国总统选举的领跑者李在明（Lee Jae-myung）表示，他将对韩国股票市场进行改革，以杜绝股票操纵行为并保护股东。【原文：Lee Jae-myung, South Korea’s presidential-election front-runner, said he would make changes to the nation’s equity markets to eradicate stock manipulation and protect shareholders.】

item.title: 尽管冶炼费用低廉，中国铜产量仍跃升至创纪录水平
item.description: 由于黄金和硫酸等副产品价格上涨，缓解了利润压力，中国铜冶炼厂上月产量创下历史新高。【原文：Chinese copper smelters boosted output to a record high last month, as rising prices for by-products including gold and sulphuric acid eased pressure on margins.】

item.title: 特朗普反对杰罗姆-鲍威尔成为抛售美元的最新理由
item.description: 周一，在唐纳德-特朗普总统考虑是否能够解雇美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔之际，抛售美元的交易势头有所增强。【原文：The sell-dollar trade gathered momentum on Monday as President Donald Trump contemplated whether he’s able to fire Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 特斯拉公牛发出 "红色警报"，称马斯克需要离开 DOGE
item.description: Wedbush Securities 分析师丹-艾夫斯（Dan Ives）为特斯拉公司再次敲响了警钟，他警告说，在这家电动汽车制造商准备于周二公布第一季度财报之际，首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）将面临自己的岔路口。【原文：Wedbush Securities analyst Dan Ives is sounding another loud alarm bell for Tesla Inc., warning that CEO Elon Musk faces his own fork in the road as the electric vehicle maker prepares to report first quarter earnings Tuesday.】

item.title: 贸易战忧虑和美元走软引发黄金反弹，创下历史新高
item.description: 未来几天将公布的数据可能会凸显出全球经济受到损害的早期迹象，因此，美国主导的贸易战削弱了市场对避险资产的需求，黄金创下历史新高。【原文：Gold hit a record as the debilitating US-led trade war underpinned demand for haven assets, with data due in the coming days that may highlight early signs of damage to the global economy.】

item.title: 韩国早期贸易数据显示关税后出口萎缩
item.description: 韩国的早期贸易数据显示，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）加大关税力度后，本月迄今为止出口萎缩，给这个亚洲出口大国的增长前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：South Korea’s early trade data showed that exports contracted so far this month after Donald Trump stepped up his tariff campaign, clouding the growth outlook for the Asian export powerhouse.】

item.title: 乌克兰与俄罗斯停战，美国与伊朗会谈成为焦点，石油价格下跌
item.description: 由于交易商担心美国主导的贸易战对能源需求的影响，同时关注华盛顿与德黑兰就伊斯兰共和国核计划举行的会谈，石油价格有所回落。【原文：Oil retreated as traders fretted about the impact of the US-led trade war on energy demand, while monitoring talks between Washington and Tehran over the Islamic republic’s nuclear program.】

item.title: 新加坡的长期债务因 2022 年以来最陡峭的曲线而得到提振
item.description: 新加坡债券的收益率曲线是约三年来最陡峭的，这预示着投资者在本月的拍卖会上购买长期债务的时机已经成熟。【原文：The steepest yield curve on Singapore’s bonds in about three years is signaling the time may be propitious for investors to buy long-dated debt at an auction this month.】

item.title: 各国央行凝视贸易战深渊，降息准备就绪
item.description: 未来几个月，全球央行大多将做好降息的准备，以缓解美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战对其经济的影响。【原文：Global central banks will mostly stand ready for interest-rate cuts in coming months to cushion their economies from US President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 亚洲股市开盘涨跌不一，美国期货下跌：市场综述
item.description: 周一亚洲股市将继续保持低迷，成交量可能稀少，一些地区市场仍因复活节假期休市，缺乏直接的交易催化剂。【原文：Asian stocks are set to remain muted in likely thin volumes on Monday with a number of regional markets still shut for Easter holidays and a lack of immediate trading catalysts.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易战悬而未决，万斯抵达印度
item.description: 剑龙-万斯周一抵达新德里，拉开了为期四天的印度之行的序幕，这次访问对这位副总统来说既具有个人意义，又具有政治意义，同时还是在唐纳德-特朗普总统发动全球贸易战的背景下进行的。【原文：JD Vance landed in New Delhi on Monday, kicking off a four-day visit to India that carries both personal and political significance for the vice president, while taking place against the backdrop of President Donald Trump’s global trade war.】
